sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import {Playground} from 'docz'
import styled from '@emotion/styled'
import Wrapper from 'bractal'
import {Button} from 'bractal/core-ui'

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = (function() {
  const Container = styled.div({
    '.react-live-preview > div > div > *': {margin: 5},
  })
  return props => (
    <Container>
      {/* <Wrapper> */}
      {props.children}
      {/* </Wrapper> */}
    </Container>
  )
})()
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             Layout={this.layout} layoutProps={Object.assign({}, layoutProps, props)}
             components={components}>


<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-example"}}>{`Basic Example`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={0} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"sizing"}}>{`Sizing`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button xl>Click This</Button>\n  <Button lg>Click This</Button>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n  <Button sm>Click This</Button>\n  <Button xs>Click This</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button xl>Click This</Button>
    <Button lg>Click This</Button>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
    <Button sm>Click This</Button>
    <Button xs>Click This</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"types"}}>{`Types`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Two types are supported, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Primary`}</MDXTag>{` `}{`&`}{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Secondary`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={2} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n  <Button secondary>Click This</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
    <Button secondary>Click This</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"fill"}}>{`Fill`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can go with the normal version, or inverted one`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={3} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n  <Button inverted>Click This</Button>\n  <Button inverted secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
    <Button inverted>Click This</Button>
    <Button inverted secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"disabled-state"}}>{`Disabled State`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can go with the disabled version, or normal one`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={4} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n  <Button disabled>Click This</Button>\n  <Button inverted>Click This</Button>\n  <Button disabled inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button secondary>Click This</Button>\n  <Button disabled secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button inverted secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button disabled inverted secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
    <Button disabled>Click This</Button>
    <Button inverted>Click This</Button>
    <Button disabled inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button secondary>Click This</Button>
    <Button disabled secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button inverted secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button disabled inverted secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"corners"}}>{`Corners`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can go for a full circle corner`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={5} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button fullRound>Click This</Button>\n  <Button fullRound inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button fullRound>Click This</Button>
    <Button fullRound inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"loading-icon"}}>{`Loading Icon`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={6} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button xs tight loading inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button xs loading inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button sm loading inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button sm loading inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button md loading secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button lg loading secondary inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button xl loading secondary>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button xxl loading secondary inverted>\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button xs tight loading inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button xs loading inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button sm loading inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button sm loading inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button md loading secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button lg loading secondary inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button xl loading secondary>
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button xxl loading secondary inverted>
      Click This
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"arbitrary-icon"}}>{`Arbitrary Icon`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={7} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button iconName=\"far fa-save\">Click This</Button>\n  <Button loading iconName=\"far fa-save\">\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button loading inverted iconName=\"far fa-save\">\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button loading secondary iconName=\"far fa-save\">\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n  <Button loading secondary inverted iconName=\"far fa-save\">\n    Click This\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button iconName="far fa-save">Click This</Button>
    <Button loading iconName="far fa-save">
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button loading inverted iconName="far fa-save">
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button loading secondary iconName="far fa-save">
      Click This
    </Button>
    <Button loading secondary inverted iconName="far fa-save">
      Click This
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"label-style"}}>{`Label Style`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`semiBold, bold & extraBold are supported`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={8} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button>Regular</Button>\n  <Button semiBold>Semi Bold (600)</Button>\n  <Button bold>Bold (700)</Button>\n  <Button extraBold>Extra Bold (900)</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button>Regular</Button>
    <Button semiBold>Semi Bold (600)</Button>
    <Button bold>Bold (700)</Button>
    <Button extraBold>Extra Bold (900)</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"using-size-prop"}}>{`Using size prop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`semiBold, bold & extraBold are supported`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={9} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button size=\"xl\">Click This</Button>\n  <Button size=\"lg\">Click This</Button>\n  <Button>Click This</Button>\n  <Button size=\"sm\">Click This</Button>\n  <Button size=\"xs\">Click This</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button size="xl">Click This</Button>
    <Button size="lg">Click This</Button>
    <Button>Click This</Button>
    <Button size="sm">Click This</Button>
    <Button size="xs">Click This</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"responsive-button-size"}}>{`Responsive button size`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This text size will be :`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`xs -> On media size from the XSmall devices and below`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`sm -> On media size from the XSmall devices and above`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`md -> On media size from the Mobile devices and above`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`lg -> On media size from the Tablet devicesand above`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`xl -> On media size from the Desktop devices and above`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`xxl -> On media size from the Large Desktop devices and above`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={10} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button important size={[\'xs\', \'sm\', \'md\', \'lg\', \'xl\', \'xxl\']}>\n    Responsive Button\n  </Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button important size={['xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl', 'xxl']}>
      Responsive Button
    </Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"padding-customizations"}}>{`Padding customizations`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"normal-tight-custom"}}>{`Normal, tight, custom`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={11} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button tight>Normal</Button>\n  <Button>Normal</Button>\n  <Button pxRatio={4}>Wide horizontal Padding</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button tight>Normal</Button>
    <Button>Normal</Button>
    <Button pxRatio={4}>Wide horizontal Padding</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"full-width"}}>{`Full Width`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={12} __code={'<Wrapper>\n  <Button block>Normal</Button>\n</Wrapper>'} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,styled,Wrapper,Button}}>
  <Wrapper>
    <Button block>Normal</Button>
  </Wrapper>
</Playground>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
